org.ow2.chameleon.rose
Class AbstractExporterComponent

java.lang.Object
  org.ow2.chameleon.rose.AbstractExporterComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
ExporterService
public abstract class AbstractExporterComponent
extends Object
implements ExporterService

Abstract implementation of an endpoint-creator ComponentFactory which provides an ExporterService. Start must be call before registering the service ! Stop must be called while the service is no more available !

Version:
0.2.0
Author:
barjo

createEndpoint

protected abstract org.osgi.service.remoteserviceadmin.EndpointDescription createEndpoint(org.osgi.framework.ServiceReference sref,
                                                                                          Map<String,Object> extraProperties)
Create an endpoint for the service linked to sref. If the service has already an endpoint with compatible properties, return the existing EndpointDescription, otherwise an exception must be thrown.

Parameters:
sref - The ServiceReference
Returns:
The EndpointDescription of the created endpoint.

destroyEndpoint

protected abstract void destroyEndpoint(org.osgi.service.remoteserviceadmin.EndpointDescription endesc)
Destroy the endpoint of endesc description.

Parameters:
endesc - The EndpointDescription

stop

protected void stop()
Stop the endpoint-creator, iPOJO Invalidate instance callback. Must be override ! Close all endpoints.

start

protected void start()
Start the endpoint-creator component, iPOJO Validate instance callback. Must be override !

Returns:
true if the ExporterService is in a valid state, false otherwise.
